captions.text:
The 6men that you
think of when it's 2PM
Back with 'GROWN'!

2PM is back as musicans,
and real men after2 years

A 2PM theatre for 
them!

The movie-like story in
12tracks are coming now!
Hello, this is 2PM

-Questions for 2PM 
from the world

We heard that we received 
a lot of questions

-ASK IN A BOX made
by fans' questions

We will solve all the questions
you have here

Ask to all the members of
2PM!

A question for all
the members

Let's talk about the 
title first

'Come back when you
hear this song' and

What are these 
songs like?

'Come back when you
hear this song' came first

It's a fun and good 
song but it's week

I think we needed 
something more manly

How was it when the
song came out?

We made the song like a man 
with sexy song,and soft song

Let's start with 
Jun Ho

My favorite song in
this album is 'At times'

I personally really 
like this song,Zero Point

This is our 3rd regular album
and I like this one the most

I like the song 'Go back'
because

I like this song because 
it's really different

But I'm not going 
to sing

Why? Because I'm 
a rapper

Then do the rap 
for us please

I think you did the
featuring for me

Now personal questions for 
2PM members!

Now we will give personal
questions per member

The first question is 
for Wooyoung

Sing the song 
for me please

Please sing the
song for me

The point choreography of
dance is the 'Jam Jam' Dance!

Are you trying to be
cute?
Come back!

-What was that?
-Come back!

Let's decide that Nickhun 
hasn't grown yet

Next question will go 
to Taecyeon

I worked on the rap of
six songs in this album

It's all different, especially
the man in 'Go Back' is bad guy

It's confessing that I'll
go find another woman

It's not love confession,
it means I'm going back

It's talking about a man
wanting to have a thrill

It's because 
when a couple

dates long there's 
no more fluttering

It's talking about wanting
to have that thrill again

It's a personal story 
of JunHo...
It could be
It could be

Are you satisfied with
the raps you wrote?

Of course I don't 
think it's good enough
You're so modest

I'll try to show better songs,
keeping on writing.
Next question!

I don't have an actual
dream girl

I like a girl who I can
talk well with

-Has to be Korean?
-Yes

-No foreigners? 
-Japanese are Okay

I think the person who asked 
the question is not Japanese

I think she might feel
sad about the answer
I'm sorry!

This is a really good 
question

What makes you feel
better when you're angry?

Thinking about 
my parents

Listening to sweet
or comfortable music

Or watching funny
movies!

Those things 
I guess

He laughs watching
his tablet PC.
Same to you too
Actually me too

These two always looks
for comedy shows

They're both not 
funny though

We are going to ask Jun
Ho a question, you ready?

I concentrate really
hard when I'm writing

I lie down like this and 
think about the situation
I know that!

He only wears panties when
he's working on a song
I was really surprised

I went into his room once,and 
he was wearing only panties

He does wear panties
right?
Excuse me, I do!

You get the soul when 
you're not wearing anything

It's better not wearing 
anything

It's better when you get 
the soul, you wear

Less since it's better
for your skin

Were you wearing 
your panties then?
I wear panties!

-It's better naked!
-You don't wear anything?

If you get a chance 
try it

I used to have a lot of 
interest in fashion before

I really like pictures 
that are illustrative

I used to wear a lot of 
T-shirts with those

I found out recently what
his interest is

He's really interested 
in sweatsuits

-That was a year ago
-Baggy pants then?
Now it's jeans

It's somewhat normal
these days
It's our fans, right?

They are the reason why
we do music

They are very thankful 
to us

They are like 
umbrella!

-Pusan for me 
-Like your home?
It's our power!
It's love for us!

We will work hard with
our music in Korea

And that's our first
plan

We have concert in Korea 
in June, so please love us!

This was 2PM's 
Ask in a Box
